alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GILCHRIST COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trenton. A strong thunderstorm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton and Bell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
